title: Patch 9
content:
10 turns. When Hiding, Shove now grants an Advantage roll instead of succeeding automatically. Speedy Sparks can now be synergised with Chain of Liberation's Sprint. Psychic Spark (previously Sapphire Spark) now grants an additional Magic Missile dart instead of a Damage Bonus. Cutting Words damage reduction is no longer doubled on Critical Hit.

Made waypoints easier to click. Updated the overhead icon that indicates when someone wants to talk to you. Added overhead feedback for when a Saving
